summary: E-commerce website for Aadi shop clothing store
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner image showing fashionable clothing display (hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png)
- Placeholder product image for men's t-shirt (product-mens-tshirt.dim_800x800.png)
- Placeholder product image for women's dress (product-womens-dress.dim_800x800.png)
- Placeholder product image for kids' outfit (product-kids-outfit.dim_800x800.png)
- Aadi Shop logo with elegant typography (aadi-shop-logo.dim_400x100.png)
- Empty cart illustration (empty-cart.dim_300x300.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that displays featured clothing products with images, names, and prices
Create a product listing page with filtering by category and price range
Create individual product detail pages showing full product information, available sizes, and add to cart functionality
Implement shopping cart functionality with ability to add, remove, and update quantities
Create checkout flow with customer information form (name, email, shipping address, phone number)
Create an admin interface for managing products (add, edit, delete) accessible through Internet Identity authentication
Design a modern, fashion-forward visual theme with warm earth tones, elegant typography, and spacious layouts that reflects a premium clothing retail experience

new_feature_requests.summary: Create e-commerce website for clothing store
Implement backend product catalog with fields for product name, description, price, category (men/women/kids), size options, and image filename
Implement order management system in backend to store and retrieve customer orders
